nodes.text: The Kinun Depot system was a star system located within the Outer Rim Territories' Pelgrin sector. It contained the location known as Kinun Depot.

At some point by 0 BBY, the Rodian slaver Malak stopped at Kinun Depot to refuel. While there, Myo, an Abyssin previously captured by Malak, escaped the Rodian's starship and booked passage to the Arkanis sector planet Tatooine.
The Kinun Depot system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it within grid square R-18.
